===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Collei)
:{{A|vo card collei invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' There's some writing on these cards... But never mind, I'll do my best!
:{{DIcon}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Collei's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card collei ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Collei:''' This is fine... Let's keep playing!

;(When the player defeats two of Collei's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card collei ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Collei:''' Oh, crud...

;(When Collei defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card collei ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' Yesss! I'm getting the hang of this.

;(When Collei uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card collei ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Collei:''' This one has to work!

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card collei invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Collei:''' Huh? I&mdash;I won!

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card collei invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Collei:''' Where did I go wrong...?
{{Dialogue end}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Collei)
:{{A|vo card collei invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' I'll try my best! Bring it on!
:{{DIcon}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Collei's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card collei ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Collei:''' ...Could be worse.

;(When the player defeats two of Collei's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card collei ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Collei:''' Still in the game!

;(When Collei defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card collei ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' On the way up!

;(When Collei uses an Elemental Burst)

;(If the player loses the match)

;(If the player wins the match)

{{Dialogue end}}

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Collei)
:{{A|vo card collei freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' Mondstadt is just the way I remember it... So many people!
:{{DIcon}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG challenge interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card collei leave 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' You're leaving? Ah... Maybe I should get going, too.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card collei endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' Phew, I finally won... I was so nervous...

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card collei endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Collei:''' *sigh*... At least it's over now... I was flagging towards the end there.
{{Dialogue end}}
